headline: Hershey (HSY) Upgraded at Piper Sandler as Cocoa Pressure Eases
summary: The Hershey Company (NYSE:HSY) is included among the 13 Best Consumer Staples Dividend Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 7, Piper Sandler upgraded The Hershey Company (NYSE:HSY) to Overweight from Neutral and raised its price target to $213 from $193.
